text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Good for him for calling you out for lying about #COVID19 being a hoax. Because @FoxNews helped promote your lie, they  are liable and likely to be sued out of business. Clearly they are trying to change “their story” in this historic event. But, it’s too late for both of you.
